selection.title: Select Language
selection.message: Please select a language to use the app.

customer.title: Customer List
customer.instructions_content:
Enter all required fields to add a customer.
Tap "Copy Previous" to load the last input data.
On phone, tap a customer to view details on a new page.
On tablet/desktop, the right pane shows the detail view.
customer.duplicate_content: A customer with the same details already exists.
customer.select_customer: Select a customer to view details.
customer.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this customer?

expense.There is no expenses in the list: There is no expenses in the list

vehicle.Instructions_content:
Enter all required fields to add a vehicle information.
 Copy Previous to load the last input data.
 Click save button save the vehicle information 
 Click on a vehicle info to view details on the page.
On tablet/desktop, the right pane shows the detail view.
vehicle.Areyousure: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
vehicle.No items: There are no items in the list
vehicle.No item selected: There is no item selected for detail
